video.title: Kate and Mim-Mim
video.synopsis: A little girl and her toy bunny go on trips to a magical world, where their pretend adventures help them solve real-world problems.

episodes.synopsis: Kate, Mim-Mim and their friends race against each other on a race car track. The gang follows a seed underground, where it looks for a place to grow.
episodes.title: Rip Roaring Race / The Need for Seed

episodes.synopsis: Kate runs out of purple paint while making a picture and later discovers the color is also missing in Mimiloo; Kate learns to round up kittens.
episodes.title: Color Me Happy / Kittens and Mittens

episodes.synopsis: After Mim-Mim loses his tail, his friends don't recognize him without it. Gobble and Tack argue over how to stop flies from eating Gobble's crops.
episodes.title: Tail Tale / Mirror Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Boomer wishes he were bigger, so he tries using Tack's Sizerchanger invention; Kate and Mim-Mim accidentally blast off in Tack's new rocket ship.
episodes.title: Boomer Size / Mim Mim’s Moon Mishap

episodes.synopsis: Kate tries to figure out who played an April Fools' Day joke on her. In Mimiloo, the gang searches for a way to fix a gigantic musical instrument.
episodes.title: Tee Hee Rex / Mega Music Maker

episodes.synopsis: Kate leads her friends on a hunt for Boomer's lost pail and shovels. Mim-Mim has trouble learning to fly huge wind flowers with the rest of the gang.
episodes.title: Lost Island / Flight of the Flowers

episodes.synopsis: When Kate's dad catches a cold, she tries to help him feel better. Kate and Mim-Mim attempt to scare Boomer's hiccups away.
episodes.title: A Case of the Giggles / Hiccups and Night Fun

episodes.synopsis: Kate and her pals build a bouncy castle made out of clouds. When the gang gets trapped in an ice cave, Kate must think of a way to get them out.
episodes.title: Cloud Castle / Snow Bowling

episodes.synopsis: Kate wants to make a special valentine for her dad. Boomer can't sleep because he lost his favorite book, so his friends act out the story for him.
episodes.title: Valentine Friends / A Storybook Ending

episodes.synopsis: The gang must figure out a way to turn the balloon tree's flat balloons into fat ones; Kate sees a shooting star and wonders where it landed.
episodes.title: Balloon Buddies / Twinkle, Twinkle

episodes.synopsis: Lily holds a contest to see who can come up with the best-smelling item. On a road trip, obstacles force Kate and her pals to go a different way.
episodes.title: Snifferific / Summer Funday Drive

episodes.synopsis: Kate gets help from her dad to build a pretend farm. When Boomer uses Tack's gadget to make himself disappear, Kate must find a way to get him back.
episodes.title: Mega Mim/ Kate the Great

episodes.synopsis: The gang wants to go on a picnic, but they can't find the picnic basket because it's lost in a huge mess. The bunniflies make Kate their princess.
episodes.title: Clean Sweep / Princess Kate

episodes.synopsis: When Mim-Mim accidentally squishes one of Gobble's pumpkins, he wishes he were lighter. Kate and her parents put on a talent show.
episodes.title: Lighter than Air / Gobble's Gift

episodes.synopsis: After Kate and her friends in Mimiloo send letters to Santa Claus, a bad storm stops the mail from being delivered to him. Will Christmas be ruined?
episodes.title: A Christmas Wish

episodes.synopsis: After Kate notices that birds aren't visiting her birdhouse, she wonders what's wrong with it. Kate is sad that the snowman she built is melting.
episodes.title: Babysitting Squoosh / Chilly the Snowman

episodes.synopsis: Kate and Mim-Mim follow clues to see why colorful things are vanishing. Mim-Mim becomes afraid on an adventure, so his pals try to make him feel safe.
episodes.title: The Curious Case of the Chamelippo / Bubble Subble

episodes.synopsis: The Mimiloo gang hides from a dragon that wants Gobble's moon flowers. At home, Kate tries to fix her broken pop-up book without any help.
episodes.title: Kate's Dragon Quest / Butterfly Flowers

episodes.synopsis: When Kate's ant farm breaks, she must figure out how to get all the ants back inside. In Mimiloo, Kate and her friends celebrate Make Up a Game Day.
episodes.title: Kate's Turtle Drive / Make up a Game Day

episodes.synopsis: Lily opens her dream café and wants everything to be perfect for an important visitor; Kate tries to win a game of pin the tail on the donkey.
episodes.title: Lily's Café / Leapfrog Underdog

episodes.synopsis: Tack runs out of new invention ideas. When Kate and Mim-Mim learn they have the same birthday, they secretly plan surprise parties for each other.
episodes.title: The Big Idea Box / Happy Mim Day

episodes.synopsis: Kate wonders what it would be like to have superpowers so she could jump high enough to get a ball stuck in a tree; Kate has trouble jumping rope.
episodes.title: Super Kate / Boom Chicka Bees

episodes.synopsis: When rain cancels a trip to the zoo, Kate and her Mimiloo friends make their own animals. Gobble accidentally copies himself using Tack's invention.
episodes.title: The Mimiloo Zoo / A Bunch O'Boomers

episodes.synopsis: Lily and the gang search for her favorite animal, the unicorn. Tack's shrinking violet petals cause Kate and Mim-Mim to become the size of insects.
episodes.title: Lily and the Unicorn / Small Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Mim-Mim wishes that his clumsy bunny fingers would change. At home, Kate catches a grasshopper, but when she puts it in a jar, it just stays still.
episodes.title: Teenie Genie/ Catch a Critter

episodes.synopsis: When a bird flies into Kate's house, she comes up with an idea for getting it back outside. The Mimiloo gang goes on a hunt for hidden treasure.
episodes.title: Follow the Leader / Treasure of Tut-n-Bunny
